description: Lightweight, classic-fitting pants made from yarn-dyed Japanese herringbone. Stone-washed. Sanded and distressed by hand. Adjustable tabs at the back of the waist.
fitting_details: Classic fit with a straight leg and regular rise.
Size 32W has a 12¼" rise and an 18½" leg opening.
Belt loops. Button fly with a shank closure.
Two front angled pockets. Two back buttoned pockets.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back of the waist.
